name: Send Messages
desc: Allows OverBot to send messages to your Discord server

name: Manage Messages
desc: Used to delete and edit messages

name: Embed Links
desc: Allows OverBot to send a link and an embed version of it

name: Add Reactions
desc: Enables the bot to add reactions when using paginate embeds

name: Use External Emojis
desc: Enables the bot to use external emojis
